description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry and Maple Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Blueberry and Maple Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place half the blueberries and maple syrup into a small saucepan. Bring to the boil over medium heat. Combine cornflour and 1 tbs water in a small bowl. Stir into blueberry mixture and boil for 1 minute or until thickened. Stir in lemon juice and transfer to a jug. Set aside to cool.
pur√©e remaining blueberries in a food processor. Add zest, flour, sugar, bicarbonate of soda, milk, egg and cinnamon and process for 30 seconds or until a smooth, thick batter forms.

Heat 2 large non-stick frying pans over medium heat. Brush each with a little butter. Using 1/4 cup batter for each pancake, add to pans in batches. Cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear on the surface. Turn and cook for 1 minute or until cooked through. Repeat with remaining butter and batter to make 12 pancakes.
Stack pancakes and serve with yoghurt, blueberry syrup and extra blueberries.
